skilled.translation[0].definitions[0].de: someone who is skilled has the training and experience that is needed to do something well
skilled.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Skilled craftsmen, such as carpenters, are in great demand.
The company is fortunate to have such highly skilled workers.
She’s very skilled at dealing with the public.
The school offers a program for students who are skilled in metalwork.
skilled.translation[0].definitions[1].de: skilled work needs people with special abilities or training to do it
skilled.translation[1].definitions[0].de: someone who is skilled has the training and experience that is needed to do something well
skilled.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Skilled craftsmen, such as carpenters, bricklayers etc, are in great demand.
Medical technology companies face a serious shortage of skilled labor (=workers with special skills) in the next decade.
In a more technological society, there will be an increased demand for a skilled workforce.
She’s very skilled at dealing with members of the public.
skilled.translation[1].definitions[1].de: work that is skilled needs special abilities or training in order to do it
